DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy tolerability fenofibrate 160 mg niacin 1500 mg patient hypertriglyceridemia low HDL-cholesterol . The primary end point percent change apoB/A1 secondary end point lipid parameter biomarkers .
